original_text: for each tree is known by its own fruit. For figs are not gathered from thornbushes, nor are grapes picked from a bramble bush.
korean_text: 나무는 각각 그 열매로 아나니 가시나무에서 무화과를, 또는 찔레에서 포도를 따지 못하느니라

sentences.original_text: for each tree is known by its own fruit.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 각 나무가 그 열매로 알려지기 때문입니다.

sentences.original_text: For figs are not gathered from thornbushes
nor are grapes picked from a bramble bush.
